node.html:
• E2E Developed & deployed a React JS web application with Firebase as backend
  • Cllasify is a Startup focused on School management systems
  • Implemented features like student enrolment,group messaging and attendance tracking, and simplified school management tasks
  • Enhanced UI for improved user experience.

• Contributed to the organization and execution of a successful tech-focused event as part of a cross-functional team, involved in defining objectives, budgets, and timelines, oordinating logistics, managing event registration and ticketing, and implementing post-event evaluations for improvement insights
• Spearheaded a team of 9 frontend developers as Lead Frontend Developer at Valsco, a dynamic startup, overseeing task assignment, code review, and project management.
